hero.title: NumberInput
hero.description:
Number Input allows users to enter numeric values (e.g., amount, price, quantity.) in a single line input field, using a masked input.
Number Input comes as a stand alone input- as main or only input in a screen.

sections.title: Usage Examples
sections.description:
markdown:The number input uses masked input, it allows the user to easily enter fixed set input where a certain format is needed (in this case- numeric values for prices with decimals, amounts, weight).  \n  \n
The masked input allows a more focused typing format, compared to the Main Input which allows the user to type more freely.

sections.title: Number Types
sections.description:
markdown:The price input supports the usage of prefix, sufix or none; depending on the case.  The supported number types presets are: Currency, Percentage, Weight, or number only.  \n  \n
Don’t use it to enter unique numeric values such as phone numbers or dates.
